humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, right sentinel lymph node #3 is positive for metastatic poorly differentiated ductal adenocarcinoma (1/1). This indicates that there is metastases in 1 axillary lymph node, which corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one out of four sentinel lymph nodes (3b) is positive for metastatic poorly differentiated ductal adenocarcinoma (1/1). This corresponds to an N1 stage. The remaining 15 axillary lymph nodes are reactive, indicating no additional metastasis.
